page.title: 02MILLBRIDGE RIDING SCHOOL
page.content:
This school contains a total of fifty six horses in three main catagories: there are twenty two privately owned horses who are liveried, i.e. they are fed, groomed and exercised by the staff for the owners who pay the school a{livery}or{fee}for the service.
There are also school ponies especially for the riding lessons for beginners.
In addition, there are{eventers}i.e. horses specially trained for show jumping, cross country racing and dressage.
There are no race horses in the school.
